name: e
description: A desktop AI assistant powered by Claude

scripts.build:desktop: bun run --filter @e/client build && bun run --filter @e/server build:binary && bun run suffix-binary
scripts.tauri:dev: bun run --filter @e/server build:binary && bun run suffix-binary && cd src-tauri && cargo tauri dev
scripts.start: bun run --filter @e/client build && bun run --filter @e/server start
scripts.test:coverage: bun run --filter @e/server test:coverage && bun run --filter @e/shared test:coverage && bun run --filter @e/client test:coverage
